long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the web through words.

Nounly (former Stinkybad.com) lets you share sites efficiently, to many people, across many devices. It's the URL shortener for humans, returning simple words, that anyone can remember.

The returned words are guaranteed to stay active for at least 24 hours, giving you ample time to retrieve the link.

Use "nounly" in the search box for even faster access to Nounly!

New: added Nounly to right-click menu on links
